inclusion.criterion: echocardiogram with left ventricular ejection fraction <40%
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: functional class I, II or III of the NYHA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: optimal medical treatment with ACE inhibitor or ARA and beta-blocker
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: no changes in pharmacological treatment in the last 4 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hospitalization for heart failure less than one month ago
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic kidney disease with glomerular filtration rate <30 ml/min/1.73m2
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: planned change of address in the next 12 months
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome, which may be a contraindication for study participation.
